requests.curl:
curl "http://smart-life.com//admin/appointments/1/accept" -d '' -X POST \
	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "X-Admin-Token: qwertyuiop1" \
	-H "X-Admin-Email: admin@example.com" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" \
	-H "Cookie: "
